text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Saudi Arabia. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Riyadh. ==List of heads of mission== ===Ambassadors to Saudi Arabia=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHead of Mission – Embassy of Malaysia, Riyadh ! Term start ! Term end |- | Mokhtar Ahmad || 1 November 1985 || 28 August 1989 |- | Adnan Osman || 26 September 1989 || 31 July 1993 |- | Mohamad Hussein Shafie || 4 October 1993 || 1 June 1996 |- | Shapii Abu Samah || 19 July 1996 || 1 August 2000 |- | Wan Mokhtar Ahmad || 23 November 2000 || 31 May 2005 |- | Ismail Ibrahim || 7 August 2005 || 6 January 2008 |- | Syed Omar Syed Mohamad Al Saggaf || 2 September 2008 || 21 September 2013 |- | Zainol Rahim Zainuddin || 4 June 2015 || 20 December 2018 |- | Abd Razak Abdul Wahab || 18 July 2019 || Incumbent |} ==See also== * Malaysia–Saudi Arabia relations == References == Saudi Arabia Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Saudi Arabia
